unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Funding!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Funding!

unnormalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch with those tuition fees? Don't worry, scholarship portals are here to save the day! Think of them as online treasure troves, packed with funding opportunities for everything from engineering at IIT Delhi to Kathak classes.
normalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch with those tuition fees? Don't worry, scholarship portals are here to save the day! Think of them as online treasure troves, packed with funding opportunities for everything from engineering at I I T Delhi to Kathak classes.

unnormalised: Forget sifting through endless websites and application forms. These portals bring everything to you in one place. Some even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile. Imagine finding a scholarship that perfectly matches your coding skills just like that!
normalised: Forget sifting through endless websites and application forms. These portals bring everything to you in one place. Some even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile. Imagine finding a scholarship that perfectly matches your coding skills just like that!

unnormalised: Popular portals like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are making education more accessible, helping countless students across India chase their dreams. Think of it as the ultimate Onam gift for your academic ambitions!
normalised: Popular portals like Buddy for Study and Vidya Lakshmi are making education more accessible, helping countless students across India chase their dreams. Think of it as the ultimate Onam gift for your academic ambitions!

unnormalised: So ditch the biryani-making for an hour (just kidding… kinda) and explore these portals. You might just find the scholarship that'll take you one step closer to your dream career. Go get 'em, tiger! Good luck!
normalised: So ditch the biryani-making for an hour (just kidding… kinda) and explore these portals. You might just find the scholarship that will take you one step closer to your dream career. Go get 'em, tiger! Good luck!
